talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Description_02>Excuse me, traveler.<sp:5:0:0> Do you...know me,
by any chance?<sp:0:4:0>Who am I? <sp:5:0:0>Where am I? <sp:5:0:0>Am I some sort
of villain? <sp:5:0:0>Or a force for good?<sp:0:4:0>I just <sp:5:0:0>can't remember...
talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Description_02>Nothing makes sense to me anymore...
Who am I, really?
talk_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:ZeldaTalkPositive_01>A villain! That's right, I'm a villain!<sp:5:0:0> Though
that's a bit disappointing to hear.<sp:0:4:0>But I guess it was inevitable that you
would find me out.
talk_1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>I didn't think you would fall for the same
trick again...<sp:0:4:0>Clearly Zelda makes for good bait!
talk_1020:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Beware_04>When we find the real Zelda, we'll send
her straight to you!<sp:1:3:4:5a000000>
talk_1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:ZeldaTalkPositive_01>Zelda! That's right, I'm Princess Zelda.<sp:5:0:0>
Thank you!<sp:5:0:0> Now I remember.
talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Beware_04>What gives? You looking for a fight?


<sp:3:0:2:0901>People will realize I'm in the Yiga Clan
if you get too close in that getup!

What'll I do if someone sees through my
perfect disguise?!
talk_1004: <sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Beware_00>You better not ruin this for me.
talk_1014:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>I was pretending to have lost my memory
to lower your guard. <sp:5:0:0>Did it work?
